level.heading: Income exempt from determination of eligibility.
Temporary Amendments of Section
level.text: For temporary (225 day) repeal of section, see § 7 of Self-Sufficiency Promotion Temporary Amendment Act of 1998 (D.C. Law 12-230, April 20, 1999, law notification 46 DCR 4143).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-241, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 4-1201.
